name: Lightless - Only One Light
description:
Disclaimer : A Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2019 (48 Hours) 

Theme: Only One

Advance through 8 simple, but complex levels using light and shadows to your advantage ; double jump in the light, use the shadows made by platforms as solid blocks, walljump, etc, in a game both mentally challenging and one that test tour platforming skills!
